message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.DS 

This paper deals with a security issue in payment channel networks, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). It also involves network infrastructure (cs.NI) and distributed computing (cs.DC) as it analyzes the routing of transactions in a peer-to-peer network. The paper also discusses the tradeoffs involved in designing a secure routing policy, which relates to social and information networks (cs.SI) and algorithms and data structures (cs.DS).
